# spiro

The goal of `spiro` is to enable a fast workflow with raw files from metabolic
carts/spiroergometry systems. It provides simple tools for data
import,processing and visualisation.

## Installation

Install the current development version from GitHub

``` {r installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("smnnlt/spiro")
```
